original: 任城樊邑人，歷仕曹魏、西晉。特立獨行，好酒，亦喜縱馬騎射。出仕後奮發向學，得司馬昭、司馬炎器重，入晉後官至司徒。
text: Rencheng Fanyi, Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. Maverick, good wine, but also like riding horses and shooting. After leaving an official position, he worked hard to learn, and was highly regarded by Sima Zhao and Sima Yan, and became an official to Situ after entering Shanxi.
